title: When the war came to Australia
creator_credit: Look Television Productions, Will Davies, Bee Reynolds and Peter Butt
brief_description: A four-part series which looks at world war two from the point of view of ordinary Australians. Australians who either took part in the war or observed it from home, talk about their experiences in between archival footage and narrated commentary.
creator_credit_for_label: Look Television Productions, Will Davies, Bee Reynolds and Peter Butt
